attribute.name: openwo
attribute.query: (select count(1) from workorder where UPPER(workorder.status) not in ('CAN', 'COMP', 'CLOSE') and workorder.assetnum = !@assetnum and workorder.siteid = !@siteid and workorder.orgid = !@orgid)

attribute.name: schedstartnotime
attribute.query: (select DATEADD(dd, DATEDIFF(dd, 0, scheduledate), 0) from assignment where wonum = !@wonum and siteid = !@siteid and orgid = !@orgid and laborcode = @personid)

attribute.name: schedassigneddate
attribute.query: (select scheduledate from assignment where wonum = !@wonum and siteid = !@siteid and orgid = !@orgid and laborcode = @personid)

entity.name: offlineitem
entity.whereclause: ((select count(invx.inventoryid) from inventory invx where invx.itemnum = !@itemnum and invx.siteid=@siteid) > 0)

option.label: Active
option.tooltip: The status of active work orders. Matchs any work order of "INPRG", "APPR", "WOEN", "ENRV", "HOLD" or "WAPPR" status.

field.tooltip: There are already one or more workorders associated with this location, click here to view them
There are already one or more workorders associated with this asset, click here to view them

property.value: schedstartnotime is null asc, schedstartnotime asc, wopriority desc
